Package Project1.Poker

Class HandEvaluator

java.lang.Object
Project1.Poker.HandEvaluator
public class HandEvaluator extends Object
The HandEvaluator class represents a utility for evaluating poker hands and calculating their probabilities. It provides methods to draw cards, create hands, print hands, evaluate hands, and calculate percentages for various poker hand types.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HandEvaluator()
    Constructs a new HandEvaluator object and initializes the deck of cards.

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      Draws a random card from the deck and removes it from the deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn Card object.

    • drawHand

      public ArrayList<Card> drawHand(int handSize)
      Draws a specified number of cards to form a poker hand.
      Parameters:
      handSize - The size of the poker hand to draw.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing the drawn Card objects representing the poker hand.

    • dealHand

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Card>> dealHand(int numOfHands, int handSize)
      Deals multiple poker hands resetting the deck after each hand is drawn.
      Parameters:
      numOfHands - The number of poker hands to deal.
      handSize - The size of each poker hand.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing ArrayLists of Card objects, representing each dealt poker hand.

    • testDrawHand

      public ArrayList<String> testDrawHand(int handSize)
      Draws a poker hand with the specified number of cards and maps suit and value to each for display.
      Parameters:
      handSize - The number of cards to draw for the hand.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList representing the drawn poker hand.

    • hasPair

      public boolean hasPair(ArrayList<Card> hand)
      Determines if a poker hand contains a pair of cards with the same value.
      Parameters:
      hand - The poker hand to check for a pair.
      Returns:
      true if the hand contains a pair, otherwise false.

    • calculatePercentage

      public double calculatePercentage(ArrayList<Integer> toBeCounted, int numOfHands)
      Calculates the percentage of occurrence of specific winning hands in a set number of hands.
      Parameters:
      toBeCounted - The list of outcomes to be counted.
      numOfHands - The total number of trials or hands.
      Returns:
      The percentage of occurrence of the specified outcomes.

    • evaluateHands

      public String evaluateHands(int numOfHands, int handSize)
      Evaluates a specified number of poker hands and the size of each poker hand. Calculates the percentage of each possible hand type (e.g., pair, three of a kind, straight, etc.) that occurs in the hands.
      Parameters:
      numOfHands - The number of poker hands to evaluate.
      handSize - The size of each poker hand.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the percentage of occurrence for each hand type.
